MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH48 postcode area of West Kirby, affecting properties in Wordsworth Walk, Shelley Way and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:57am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:42pm on 15th March 2021.
